description: Go beyond band aids. This compact kit helps prevent and treat blisters. Use a pre-cut moleskin patch on a hotspot to reduce friction. Apply a hydrogel dressing to stop pain and promote healing on a developed blister.Contains 11 die-cut moleskin pieces, shaped to fit common blister areas.GlacierGel hydrogel blister dressings, 1 large oval, 1 small rectangular.6 antiseptic wipes.6 alcohol swabs.
name: Adventure Medical Kits Blister Medic Kit
